member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR
member.summary: Defines media key error codes for the media engine.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR.MF_MEDIAENGINE_KEYERR_CLIENT
member.summary: An error with the client occurred.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR.MF_MEDIAENGINE_KEYERR_SERVICE
member.summary: An error with the service occurred.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR.MF_MEDIAENGINE_KEYERR_OUTPUT
member.summary: An error with the output occurred.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR.MF_MEDIAENGINE_KEYERR_HARDWARECHANGE
member.summary: An error occurred related to a hardware change.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_KEYERR.MF_MEDIAENGINE_KEYERR_DOMAIN
member.summary: An error with the domain occurred.
